synopsis.text:
His name is Ryuu Yamada, a lackadaisical second-year student at Suzaku High, always late, always napping, and always scraping the bottom of the academic barrel. She is Urara Shiraishi, the epitome of academic excellence and the school's brightest star. Their lives couldn't be more different, until an unexpected kiss on the school stairs catapults them into an extraordinary situation - they swap bodies!

As they grapple with their new realities, they stumble upon an even more bizarre phenomenon: a simple kiss triggers their body swap. But that's not all. Their school, it seems, is home to seven mysterious witches. Intrigued and determined, Ryuu and Urara embark on a thrilling journey to unveil the identities of these enigmatic figures.

Join Ryuu and Urara as they navigate the complexities of high school life in each other's shoes, all while unraveling the secrets of the seven witches. Prepare for a whirlwind of laughter, drama, and suspense in this captivating tale of friendship, self-discovery, and a touch of magic.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
